1.title: Ice Box Canyon

episode of.title: Where I Got the Shot (TV Series 2017â€“ )

1.plot: A visual sensory overload of colors and wildlife. A short adventure, highlighting the many different things that you can see around the area of where I got the shots in Ice Box Canyon, Red Rock Conservation Area, Nevada - while providing tips, safety information and examples and other cool information.

imdb.plot outline: Professional Photographer and Docu-Series Host Barton Anderson takes you on adventures, exploring the areas where his most popular photographs were taken in this exciting, entertaining and informative docu-series titled "Where I Got the Shot". He doesn't discuss camera settings or techniques - but he does present uncommonly found and interesting things that you may not have known about, expected or are rarely seen in each area. If you're into travel, nature and beauty, and you're wondering what more you can do and see aside from what is publicized and advertised, this could very well be your information source. Many of his photographs are taken where you'd least expect them to be found.
